text: Today on the West Coast, conditions are poor with a weak 2 ft @12s WNW swell and light 4 mph NNE winds. Tomorrow sees a slight improvement with Dunaverty offering 2 ft @7s ENE, though wind picks up to 14 mph E, making it a bit choppy. Day after, the swell drops to 1 ft @8s WNW with fresh 20 mph W winds, leaving it blown out. Best: tomorrow.
